title: The Rainstorm
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR60L
description: April showers bring May flowers. What can you expect to see when a rainstorm arrives? The Rainstorm depicts what happens before, during, and after a storm through detailed photographs. Students have the opportunity to sequence events and connect to prior knowledge. High-frequency words and repetitive phrases also support early emergent readers.
reviewWords: clouds, lightning, puddle, rain, rainbow, sky, Sun
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /r/ sound
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
